full_sentence: Who says here that our own country isn't able to afford doing what it used to? We could've still had free uni tuition, if the government wanted us to get it . They didn't. The problem isn't that the refugees are getting this privilege now. It's that we're not getting it because of them. It's a punch in the face, as they're trying to drag others down with them. It's so destructive :(
